alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Lexington (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 1:49PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lexington and northeastern Aiken Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 149 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southeast of Batesburg-Leesville, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lexington, Red Bank, Pelion, Gilbert, Lexington County Airport At Pelion, Peachtree Rock, Edmund, Camp Kinard, Steedman, Barr Lake, Samaria Fire Station, Red Bank Sports Complex and Cedar Pond Campground. This includes Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 35 and 54. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
